Read the passage and choose the best answers to the questions

30. How are the old Olympics and Modern Olympics similar?

The Olympics are held every four years.
But it wasn’t always like this. The Olympics started back in the year 776 BC in Greece. Back then, every four years the best male athletes in Greece would compete against in many different sports. Some of the sports they played were running, chariot horse racing, javelin throwing, and wrestling. But in 393 AD, the games were banned and forgotten.
